alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Greene; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 10:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Greene, Craighead, Poinsett, northwestern Mississippi, northwestern Crittenden, northeastern Cross and west central Lauderdale Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Paragould to near Grubbs. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Osceola, Trumann, Manila, Marked Tree, Harrisburg, Bono, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Luxora, Tyronza, Keiser, Crowleys Ridge State Park and Lake Frierson State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Greene; Mississippi; Poinsett
